text: Na sabnsabnar a piyakambokhag so manga sogo ko miyaonaan ka: Na miphantang siran ko kiyapakambokhaga kiran, go so kiyaringasaa kiran, taman ko kiyapakatalingoma kiran o tabang Ami: Ka da a phakasambi ko manga katharo o Allah. Na sabnsabnar a adn a miyakaoma rka ko manga totholan ko manga sogo
